DOC.brief_summary: This is a 1-year, open-label, long-term safety extension for patients who have completed prior istradefylline studies 6002-EU-007, 6002-US-013 or 6002-US-018.
DOC.brief_title: An Extension of Istradefylline in Parkinson's Disease Patients Who Have Completed Studies 6002-EU-007, 6002-US-013 or 6002-US-018
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with Parkinson's disease with motor complications on levodopa therapy who completed the prior double-blind studies 6002-EU-007, 6002-US-013 or 6002-US-018 are eligible to enter into this 1-year, long-term open safety study with a starting istradefylline dose of 40mg per day.
DOC.criteria: Completion of study 6002EU007, 6002US013 or 6002US018 Nonpregnant and either not of childbearing potential or using specified contraception History of psychotic illness Variant/atypical Parkinson's disease Cancer within 5 years of enrollment ALT/AST levels > 1.5 times ULN Seizure disorder Neuroleptic malignant syndrome
